column4: ANYBODY THAT WOULD HELP ME  i have a problem with my screen. My screen keeps going skinny and all i usualy have to do is hit the monitor but now its stuck on skinny DOSE ANYBODY KNOW HOW TO FIX IT OR WHAT THE PROBLEM IS??

\ ANYBODY THAT WOULD HELP ME  i have a problem with my screen. My screen keeps going skinny and all i usualy have to do is hit the monitor but now its stuck on skinny DOSE ANYBODY KNOW HOW TO FIX IT OR WHAT THE PROBLEM IS?
do you mean you have to physically hit the monitor?
look for a menu button on the front of the monitor, then look for degauss
